name: Wahur Tae Fin' Nessie
description:
You will Need unreal 5 to open the project due to having SDK update issues that will need to be resolved but not in time for an EGX submission. The project video shows the entire game.

The Game is still in production and only started 3 weeks ago and the duration will will be upto 8th of September for university but may work on the project past the deadline date.

There are loads of pictures of the game to browse through

Description

The objective is to solve what happened to the player's uncle and also to discover whether or not the LochNess Monster is real. The player will be presented with environmental events and through the terrain for unexplained but also plausible reasons to why the terrain is like that or if there is a broken object in the game.
